person.name: Sentri
person.topic: I rule this province.
Very well.
Yes, these islands and much more.
I know but one of three syllables-'cor'.Dost thou know the four cities of courage?Very good.They are Jhelom, Minoc, Trinsic and Skara Brae.

person.name: the gate guard.
person.topic: Guard the gates, of course.
Very strong!
These are the gates to Serpent castle.
Guard, watch, protect.Art thou here to find courage?Then thou art at the right place.Then perhaps to become a guard!

person.name: Lassorn
person.topic: I am a sailor.
I alone survived the shipwreck.
The H.M.S. Cape.Ever heard of her?She was a mighty vessel!She was a mighty vessel!
She went down in the deep waters of the bay in the Cape of Heroes!

person.name: Roark
person.topic: I fight for Britannia!
Just healed.Art thou well?Then strive to find the secrets of the abyss.Thou hast come to the right place.
The Great Stygian Abyss holds the codex of ultimate wisdom!
I know little.

person.name: a ranger.
person.topic: I am training!
Excellent.
I train so that I might survive the dungeons!
I plan to conquer the secret of the altar rooms.Dost thou?Ask our teacher about the rooms for she knowns much!Wimp.

person.name: Shyra
person.topic: I train warriors to fight with courage!
Prime.
Train well and thy courage can grow with confidence.Wilt thou train?Bravo!Pity.
In the altar room of courage use the red, orange, purple and white stones!

person.name: a baronial guard
person.topic: I guard our lord
Most good.
Sentri rules this castle.Dost thou wish an audience with Sentri?Granted, enter.Then do not disturb him.
This castle is built on courage.

person.name: a treasure guard
person.topic: We guard our lord's treasure.
Excellent.
This treasure is not for theeDost thou intend to steal our lord's treasure?Fool!Wise move!
Seek out Durham for knowledge of dungeons.

person.topic: I fight with courage!Dost thou?Good.Then train!
Quite well.
Courage makes kings out of knaves!

person.name: Durham
person.topic: I quest for glory!
Fairly well.
I feel that when on a quest my life has purpose!Art thou on a quest?Then thy life has meaning!What a loss.
The altar room of courage gives the third part of a key.

person.topic: I have important information.
Well enough.

Nice and wet!
